summary:
Bagserk\'s Xvision Children mod Version 2.0 or 2.1 fix.
Oversized kids bug fix.
descriptionHtml:
Xvision Children vesiron2.0 or 2.1 is required.
Playable race plugin is not supported.
Bagserk\'s Xvision Children mod is here.
http://bagserk.blogspot.jp/2012/05/xvision-children-skyrim-children.html

-What does this mod do?
 Oversized kids bug fix.

-How to use
 Overwrite esp.

-If you use xvision Children Hearthfire Patch.
Put this esp under the xvisionchildren - hearthfire.esp.
Then maybe OK, I think.
(Because,I don\'t have Hearthfire, so i can\'t test Hearthfire Patch)

--What does this mod do? for Creation kit user.
Just check all of child races \"Child\" checkbox.
That\'s all. Simple.
Then Checked races can use \"child can use\" object only(child bed etc)

Many thanks for Bagserk and his or her great job.
http://bagserk.blogspot.jp/
author: alalagi
